org.kynosarges.tektosyne.graph

Class FloodFill<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kynosarges.tektosyne.graph.FloodFill<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of all nodes in the Graph

    public class FloodFill<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a flood fill algorithm for Graph instances. Starts on a specified starting node, and recursively finds any adjacent nodes that match the conditions defined by a specified Predicate.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Graph<T> graph
      The Graph on which all searches are performed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FloodFill(Graph<T> graph)
      Creates a FloodFill algorithm for the specified Graph.

      Finds all contiguous graph nodes that match the specified conditions, starting from the specified source node.
      java.util.List<T> nodes()
      Gets all graph nodes that were reached by the last successful search.

      • FloodFill

        public FloodFill(Graph<T> graph)
        Creates a FloodFill algorithm for the specified Graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - the Graph on which all searches are performed

        java.lang.NullPointerException - if graph is null

    • Method Detail

      • findMatching

        public boolean findMatching(java.util.function.Predicate<T> match,
                            T source)
        Finds all contiguous graph nodes that match the specified conditions, starting from the specified source node. Returns false if graph does not contain source, or if there are no contiguous nodes for which match succeeds. Otherwise, returns true and sets nodes() to the result of the flood fill.
        Parameters:
        match - the Predicate to test against each graph node
        source - the source node within graph where the search starts
        Returns:
        true if one or more graph nodes that pass match could be reached from the specified source, else false
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if match or source is null

      • nodes

        public java.util.List<T> nodes()
        Gets all graph nodes that were reached by the last successful search. Returns an empty collection if the last findMatching(java.util.function.Predicate<T>, T) call returned false, or if the method has not yet been called.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable List containing all graph nodes that were reached by the last successful findMatching(java.util.function.Predicate<T>, T) call, not including the source node
